title: AT DORAPE An Antique house for sale
details:
This property is situated at dorape, angulugaha, Akuressa road. Faced to the Akuressa road and back side has a beautiful paddy fields . Very old trees and bushes in the garden. A well maintained family house. There are more than ten rooms. In front of the house a commercial building.
This property is ideal for a tourist villa, bungalow or commercial purpose.
